title: Khan Jaqmaq
text: Khan Jaqmaq () is one of the few remaining <a href="caravansary">khan</a>s in the <a href="Old%20City%20of%20Damascus">Old City of Damascus</a>, it was built by the Mamluk emir, <a href="Sayf%20ad-Din%20Jaqmaq">Sayf ad-Din Jaqmaq</a> who was governor of Damascus in 1418–20. It was rebuilt to a great extent in 1601.
